page.title: 15Thurso Swimming Pool
page.content: One of the main interests in Thurso is the Swimming Pool. It was opened 18 years ago in 1967. Here are some details.The pool is 27 yards long and 10 yards wide. There are 64 000 gallons of water in the pool.In the shallow end it is 3ft and in the deep end it is 6ft. In the summer and winter there are different temperatures. There are 5 long rafts and 2 round rafts. The diving board is 6m high and 2m long. There is only 1 person allowed on the chute at a time. On Sundays there are an average of 50_60 people with armbands which help them learn to swim. There are more males than females in the Swimming Pool all through the week. There are about 200_250 under school age children who use the pool on the week days. There are about 300 people in six hours on Sundays.
